comments.body:
Sorry I missed this first time I looked, you should define an [`entry_point`](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=entry_points#python-entry-points) as there are [`console_scripts` in the `setup.py`](https://github.com/spyder-ide/qtsass/blob/master/setup.py#L56-L59):
```suggestion
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - qtsass = qtsass.cli:main
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - qtsass = qtsass.cli:main
